summary: Fixed offsetHeight and React error #31 issues in AccountPopover component. Added null checks and DOM validation for anchorEl in AccountPopover.js, similar to previous Popover fixes. Also improved handleOpenPopover in SecondNavbar.js to validate anchorRef.current before opening popover. This prevents errors when clicking on Avatar in header.
current_status: All Popover-related errors fixed including AccountPopover. Next.js rebuilt and restarted. Ready for testing Avatar click in header.
